item.title: Microsoft Defender Experts - S.T.A.R. Series
item.description: Co-author: Samantha Gardener To stay ahead of today’s sophisticated cyber threats, organizations must embrace a proactive defense strategy that includes these three pillars: emerging trends, adaptive strategies, and actionable insights. Threat actors are increasingly leveraging AI-driven attacks, supply chain compromises, and identity-based exploits. Modern strategies focus on zero trust principles, continuous threat hunting, and leveraging advanced threat intelligence to predict and neutralize risks before they escalate.
